bodyText: Caroline grew up in Arlington spending every Saturday morning in her grandmother's kitchen. Together they'd bake everything from flaky pie crusts to perfectly decorated cakes, and she fell in love with every moment of it.
headerText: A Love for Baking from Day One

bodyText: After graduating with a degree in Business & Entrepreneurship, Caroline knew exactly what she wanted to do. She started Sweet Hope Bakery with a pop-up stand at the local farmers market, where her almond croissants sold out every single week.

Caroline loves connecting with the community through seasonal tastings and working with local farms to create new flavors. Her goal is simple: bring people together with delicious, homemade treats that feel like home.
